title: The Effect of presentation training to the management trainees' performance
abstract: The writers would like to praise God for His grace and mercy support to finish the study at Petra Business English, Petra Christian University Surabaya. The writer also expresses gratitude to all of Petra Business English teachers who have played essential roles in the success of the writers, especially Ibu Yosefa, for her lecturing and elaboration on how to write a report. Furthermore, the writer would like to express deep appreciation to Ibu Leniwati Slamet for her patience, guidance, encouragement, and Jacob for his great help in supporting the writer in finishing this paper.
contributors: LENIWATI SLAMET (Advisor 1); Josefa Juniarti Mardijono (Examination Committee 1)
